summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5961 for the improvement of 25th Avenue South from Raymond Street to Juneau Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79600, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
